coffees.name: Espresso
coffees.description: A strong black coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

coffees.name: Cappuccino
coffees.description: A coffee drink made with espresso, hot milk, and steamed milk foam.

coffees.name: Latte
coffees.description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, often topped with froth.

coffees.name: Americano
coffees.description: A diluted espresso with hot water, resembling a drip-brewed coffee.

coffees.name: Macchiato
coffees.description: An espresso with a small amount of steamed milk and foam on top.

coffees.name: Mocha
coffees.description: An espresso with chocolate syrup, steamed milk, and whipped cream.

coffees.name: Flat White
coffees.description: A coffee drink made with espresso and velvety steamed milk.

coffees.name: Affogato
coffees.description: A dessert of ice cream or gelato topped with a shot of hot espresso.

coffees.name: Vienna Coffee
coffees.description: A blend of coffee, whipped cream, and cocoa powder on top.

coffees.name: Egg Coffee
coffees.description: A traditional Vietnamese coffee drink with egg yolks and condensed milk.

coffees.name: Black Tea
coffees.description: A type of tea made from the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant.

coffees.name: Green Tea
coffees.description: A type of tea made from unoxidized tea leaves.

coffees.name: Chai Tea
coffees.description: A spiced tea drink made with black tea, milk, and various spices.

coffees.name: Peppermint Tea
coffees.description: A herbal tea made from peppermint leaves.

coffees.name: Jasmine Tea
coffees.description: A type of tea scented with the aroma of jasmine flowers.

coffees.name: Earl Grey Tea
coffees.description: A flavored tea with a distinctive citrus flavor from bergamot orange.

coffees.name: Bubble Tea
coffees.description: A tea-based drink with chewy tapioca pearls and various flavors.

coffees.name: Milk Tea
coffees.description: A tea-based drink made with milk and sweeteners.

coffees.name: Lemonade
coffees.description: A sweetened lemon-flavored beverage.

coffees.name: Iced Chocolate
coffees.description: Chilled chocolate-flavored drink served with ice.
